column2: A method that uses more methods or variables from another (unrelated) class than from its own class violates the principle of putting data and behavior in the same place.
column4: Method Main is too closely tied to [["StateMachine<,>"|"file:///home/badgy/sw/s02_e04/test_repos/stateless/src/Stateless/bin/Debug/netstandard2.0/Stateless.dll:0:0:0:0"]]: 4 dependencies to it, but only 0 dependencies to its own type.
